Ben Scott

~/A list of my favourite Visual Studio shortcuts

Tweet

27 Mar 2014

Set them in Tools -> Options -> Environment -> Keyboard.

  • File.Close: Ctrl+Shift+W
  • Window.MovetoPreviousTabGroup: Ctrl+Shift+Alt+[
  • Window.MovetoNextTabGroup: Ctrl+Shift+Alt+]
